title: Chargrilled chicken, red onion and grape salad
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets', 'chicken seasoning to taste', 'dried sage to taste', 'dried basil to taste', 'salad leaves', '1 large bunch seedless grapes, halved', '2 sticks celery, diced', '1 red onion, diced', '1 handful basil, cut in thin strips', '1 handful flaked almonds (optional)', '200g mayonnaise']
